t: Amazon.com: Amazon Brand - Happy Belly Deluxe Mixed Nuts, 44 oz
s: Customers find these mixed nuts tasty, fresh, and healthy, noting they're better than popular brands and offer excellent value. The mix quality receives mixed feedback - while customers appreciate the variety, some mention there are too many almonds and cashews.
